name: red-flute
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Cures attraction.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A flute made from red glass that snaps Pokémon out of infatuation.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A flute made from red glass that snaps Pokémon out of infatuation.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A flute made from red glass. It snaps Pokémon out of infatuation.
